DOC.brief_summary: The aim study follow : - To improve self-management intention behavior patient type 2 diabetes ( T2 DM ) . - To promote patient make plan self-management gradually integrate self-management plan daily life . - To improve resilience , well-being , fatigue quality life patient T2 DM In order achieve aim , set follow objective : - To develop apply self-management education program base extend theory plan behavior . - To evaluate efficacy educational program : 1 . Self-management education program deliver face face ( intervention group ) ; ( b ) standard usual care ( comparison group ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Self-management Education Based Theory Planned Behavior Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This study employ quasi-experimental study design intervention comparison group follow-up 3 month ; two measuring point ( baseline 3 month intervention ) , 9 measure .
DOC.criteria: 1. age ≥18 year 2. duration type 2 diabetes ≥3 month 3. without severe complication impaired cognition . Exclusion criterion : 1. severe physical handicap mental illness 2. presence serious disease cancer stroke .
